entry.title: Calm & Bright
entry.summary:
Author: Frawg_Spawn

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,112Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 50

Summary: “Oh!” Eddie glances between Buck and Father Brian. “This is, my, uh, well - this is Buck.” He gestures to Buck, feeling sweat beginning to bead on the back of his neck.Nice going, Eddie, he thinks. Really fumbled that spectacularly.“Yeah, I’m his Buck,” Buck agrees easily, unbothered by Eddie’s awkwardness. He shakes Father Brian’s hand. “Nice to meet you."~Or, it's Christmas tradition for Eddie to attend midnight mass with Tia Pepa, this year Buck tags along and Eddie runs into a familiar face.

entry.title: Just one more breath
entry.summary:
Author: CarpeDiem911

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 64,961Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 275

Summary: The hysterical laughter stole every coherent thought from Buck and crawled into his bones; his heart thudded and he stared at the doll in disbelief. Then, as suddenly as it had started, the laughter stopped; leaving an eerie silence. Buck stood frozen, his thoughts like thick mud, staring at that stupid doll. He completely missed the huge hole in the wall above the tub. He missed the shadow standing there, watching him from behind the hole with cold eyes and a malicious smile.

entry.title: Toothpaste Coffee
entry.summary:
Author: sassay

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,002Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: “Look, peppermint is fine for toothpaste...but it doesn't belong in desserts and it doesn't need to be in everything for something to be Christmassy.” “But peppermint mocha Eddie!” Buck whines. “Toothpaste coffee,” Eddie counters. Peppermint is literally the flavour of Christmas, so Buck cannot believe it when Eddie says he doesn't like the taste. There has to be something wrong with him, or he's lying. Either way Buck is determined to find a peppermint flavoured treat that Eddie likes. PROMPT 15 - PEPPERMINT/CANDY CANES

entry.title: baby, where the hell is my husband (what is taking him so long?)
entry.summary:
Author: queerbaited_by_ABC

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,268Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 76

Summary: “Oh no.” Buck says, shaking his head and pointing at him from across the counter. “No, no no, absolutely not, whatever you’re about to say—““You don’t even know what I was gonna say!” Eddie protests.Buck scoffs, crossing his arms. Eddies eyes track the movement, watching semi-entranced as his biceps stretch the fabric of his t-shirt. “Knowing how petty you are? You were probably about to propose we tell them we’re married or something!”Eddie innocently looks to the kitchen ceiling and not at Bucks face, which he’s sure has flushed that pretty pink that compliments his blue eyes so well.Jesus, has he always been this sappy?“Eddie.” Buck says. “Eddie.” He stresses again.---or: When the new HOA president, Jason, wages war with Eddie about their "extra house guest" despite the fact that Buck is a resident just as much as the rest of them? Well, it makes very simple sense to Eddie to propose marriage about it-fake marriage, that is.

entry.title: i see trouble (and i want him to come my way)
entry.summary:
Author: neonweeknds

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 221,658Chapters: 23/24Kudos: 87

Summary: Buck was riding the high of his first successful solo debut, still nursing the ache of someone who walked away, when he got news that blindsided him—his upcoming solo tour wouldn’t be so solo after all. He’d be sharing the stage with Eddie Diaz, a rising country star with a mysterious past and a sound that was quickly blowing up. At first, Buck hated the idea. The last thing he wanted was to split the spotlight he’d fought so hard for. But then he actually got to know Eddie. The problem? Buck had always blurred the line between friendship and something more—and with Eddie, it was getting harder to tell the difference. or the pop star evan buckley and country singer eddie diaz slow burn angsty friends to lovers au.

entry.title: would you hold it down and take it if i gave you a chance?
entry.summary:
Author: retrorecord

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,600Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 1

Summary: EDDIE doesn’t know why the program is getting more meat to chew up and spit out by the newest Jaeger Mark; the rookies are showing more promise and far less stubbornness. Eddie’s going to prove his own point, though, even if that means having to be nice to Jaeger pilots, and maybe opening a bit more about himself and how he ended up in the Hong Kong Shatterdome. TOMMY understands Evan’s paranoia about their compatibility, and the invitation from Hong Kong to show their stuff to be pilots for a new Mark of Jaeger seemed like a perfect opportunity for them. Tommy knew they were going to be tested, pushed, and pulled, especially with a category of Kajiu looming. Tommy just didn’t know his test would be called Eddie. BUCK had paced the floors of the Los Angeles Shatterdome to polish by the time he, Tommy, and Maddie moved to the Hong Kong Shatterdome. Buck was ready for new dynamics, but the rift between pilots and staff was a shock. Buck himself tastes the brunt of it, and after some pretty bad footing, Buck finds the steadiness with some help and a petty charge nurse.

entry.title: Out of an Orange Colored Sky
entry.summary:
Author: Hawkbooty

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 131,301Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 49

Summary: Eddie Diaz stepped cautiously into the dilapidated remains of the abandoned building, and a sense of unease washed over him.The sunlight struggled to pierce through the grimy windows, casting long, eerie shadows that danced on the cracked floorboards.His shotgun was firmly strapped to his back, providing some semblance of security, but in this world turned upside down, he preferred the familiarity of his pistol, especially in places like this, and the small confines, which he held tightly in his gloved hand as he began his search.Despite the dust and decay that enveloped everything in sight, Eddie’s instincts screamed at him to remain vigilant.This was no ordinary scavenging trip; He was not just looking out for himself—he was on a vital mission to gather food for his struggling group back at the camp, people who depended on him for survival.▬▬▬9-1-1 / Fallout AU

entry.title: mom, i think i'm gay
entry.summary:
Author: captainmcspirk

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,953Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 245

Summary: “Have I ever told you about Gabriel?” Buck shakes his head.“One of your Army buddies?”“No, my first kiss.”--Buck can only hear Helena’s muffled voice from the other side of the phone. He picks up a few words. Chris. Hospital. And Buck feels like he’s suffocating, like all the air has been punched out of his lungs, like he’s being held underwater. He's reliving the tsunami all over again. “Yeah, yeah okay. I’ll be there. Bye, mom.” Eddie is running his shaking hands through his hair, eyes wide. Buck has a panicked look on his face, too scared to speak. He studies Eddie who looks like he’s figuring out how to feel. Buck caresses the crook of Eddie’s arm. That prompts the brunet to speak. “It’s my dad…He had a stroke.”--Eddie comes out, Ramon has a stroke, and Buck is there to support Eddie through it all as they head to El Paso.

entry.title: love drunk
entry.summary:
Author: rizcriz

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,985Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 250

Summary: “What are you talking about?” Maddie’s voice asks, slightly tinny. The door struggles to open behind him and he drops the phone. “Mads,” he says, panic slinking into every syllable. “I—I think—“ “Buck, come out,” Bobby says. “Please, baby.” Buck’s stomach turns and he shakes his head. No, absolutely not. That—crime against humanity is what that is. As if lunch hadn’t been traumatizing enough. “Was that Bobby?” Maddie’s voice is distant but rightfully alarmed. “Something’s wrong with them,” Buck yells down at the phone. “I—I know I said I can get anyone to fall in love with me but this is not what I meant!”or, the 118 gets dosed with a love potion.

Definitely,” Eddie answered, flushing a somehow darker shade of red than Buck.And, okay, Eddie knows that’s not exactly a conversation, but it’s as good as! So he and Buck are… something. entry.title: A Chance to See
entry.summary:
Author: HeyYouBuckaroo

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,430Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 32

Summary: The thing is, Buck’s been getting along just fine not thinking about it. When it first happened, he’d chalked it up to a weird grief thing. A temporary bout of insanity. Eddie hadn’t seemed keen to discuss it either, and so Buck happily shoved it into a mental box labeled Never Think About This Again. Except, not talking about it had backfired. His friendship with Eddie had turned awkward, then unbearable. Obviously, it was Buck’s fault. Buck, who never knew when to leave well enough alone. Buck, who’s too intense, too needy, and too much. Part of him is shocked it took this long for everything to implode. He and Eddie have been on a collision course since the day last year when Eddie told Buck he was leaving. Maybe since before that. The kiss was just the moment of impact.

entry.title: I’ll Be Home for Christmas
entry.summary:
Author: UnlostDrarry

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,751Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 29

Summary: “I was in the closet.” Eddie took a deep breath and grabbed Buck’s hands in his own before continuing. “Both literally and metaphorically.” “I… Am I understanding you correctly? You were in the closet in the bedroom when Jee came in? And you were also in the other kind of closet? The closet that I was in and came out of?” “Yes.” Eddie exhaled heavily, looking Buck in the eyes, illuminated by the stars and the light from the kitchen window. “I… I don’t have a label for myself yet. I don’t really know what it means, if I’m bi like you or I’m gay or some other third thing. What I do know is that you’re the person I want to spend the rest of my life with, and that’s enough for me.”
